parameters.name: EntityDescription
parameters.description: The description specified when the entity was added to the collection. Supports fuzzy matching. Valid only for the album type.

parameters.name: EntityName
parameters.description: The entity name. Supports fuzzy matching.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sort order. Valid values:

*   Asc (default): ascending order.
*   Desc

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of records per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The sort field. Valid values:

*   Name (default)
*   CreateTime
